name: Beef and Bean Dip
author: Billyboy
summary: Family loves to make burritos out of this beef and bean dip.
ingredients: 2 medium sweet onions (such as Vidalia®), thinly sliced
1 (12 ounce) bottle zesty Italian-style salad dressing
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Heat butter and oil in a very large skillet over medium heat
Add onions and garlic and saute until translucent, about 5 minutes
Add ground beef and chili powder; cook and stir until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Add salad dressing and salsa and bring to a boil
Add beans and stir until smooth
Pour into a baking dish or foil pan
Bake in the preheated oven, stirring every 15 minutes, until hot, about 1 hour
Sprinkle cheese on top if desired and cook until melted, about 15 more minutes
